data.title: Rhode Island's Most Wanted
data.text:
Jonathan D. Espinal

D.O.B: 12/7/1989

Race/Ethnicity: Hispanic

Sex: Male

Height: 5'7"

Weight: 125 pounds

Hair: Black

Eyes: Brown

RI - SID: 10175317

Last Known Address: 167 Grand Street, Providence, RI

Alias Name/D.O.B: Pesao

Remarks: Subject may have fled to New York or Mexico. He is a known gang member of the M.O.P. (Members of Pine)

Charges: Felony Assault With A Firearm

Originating Agency: Providence Police Department

History: Espinal is wanted for the shooting of two men sitting in a parked car outside the Institute for the Study and Practice of Nonviolence on Oxford Street in the City of Providence, Rhode Island on March 18, 2011.

Status: At large

Alex Vigniero

D.O.B: 5/16/1974

Race/Ethnicity: Hispanic

Sex: Male

Height: 5'4"

Weight: 140 pounds

Hair: Black

Eyes: Brown

RI - SID: None

Last Known Address: 103 Waldo Street, Providence, RI

Alias Name/D.O.B: Luis Gonzalez-Caban, "Puto", 4/17/1978

Remarks: Subject possesses a Massachusetts ID. Subject is an illegal immigrant.

Charges: First Degree Murder

Originating Agency: Providence Police Department

History: Vigniero is wanted for a murder that occurred on March 7, 2008 at 103 Waldo Street, Providence, Rhode Island. A Federal warrant has been issued for his arrest by U.S. Department of Homeland Security as an illegal immigrant. He was last seen operating RI Passenger Registration GT-373 displayed on a blue 2000 Nissan Maxima.

Status: At large

Dennys P. Cabrera

D.O.B: 4/22/1984

Race/Ethnicity: Black

Sex: Male

Height: 6'0"

Weight: 180 pounds

Hair: Black

Eyes: Brown

RI - SID: 10152256

Last Known Address: 31 Gladstone Street, Providence, RI

Alias Name/D.O.B: None known

Remarks: Subject is from the Dominican Republic. Subject may have fled to New York.

Charges: First Degree Murder

Originating Agency: Providence Police Department

History: Cabrera shot and killed Nairobi Acosta on November 4, 2007 as he exited an after hours party at 76 Baxter Street, Providence, Rhode Island. Cabrera also shot and wounded Claudio Nieves, who was standing outside the residence.

Status: At large

Sergio Salazar

D.O.B: 1/16/1975

Race/Ethnicity: Hispanic

Sex: Male

Height: 5'9"

Weight: 170 pounds

Hair: Brown

Eyes: Brown

RI - SID: 9912246

Last Known Address: 165 Knight Street, Providence, RI

Alias Name/D.O.B: Sergio Salazar-Ascencio

Remarks: Subject was born in Guatemala

Charges: First Degree Murder

Originating Agency: Providence Police Department

History: Salazar is wanted for a homicide that occurred at 26 Shiloh Street, Providence on February 16, 2000. He was indicted in 2003 after being arrested in 2000 and then set free.

Status: At large

Ronald L. Fischer

D.O.B: 1/26/1956

Race/Ethnicity: White

Sex: Male

Height: 5'10"

Weight: 190 pounds

Hair: Reddish-brown

Eyes: Hazel

RI - SID: 10103556

Last Known Address: 61 Sleepy Hollow Road, East Greenwich, RI

Alias Name/D.O.B: Ron Stevenson, Jeff Fischer, Jeff Fisher, Steve Harris, Emery Fischer, Robert Anderson, "Kevin", John Crawford, Ronald Pinsky, Ron Moidel, Carl Benedict, Dr. Steven Greenwood, Dr. Antonell, Robert Burgess, Robert Kruger, Gary Johnson, Dr. Henry Stevenson, 1/26/1966

Remarks: Fisher is a master yachtsman, a world traveler, and internationally connected. Fisher's former profession was that of an anesthesiologist. Fisher has been featured several times on the television show "America's Most Wanted."

Charges: Failure To Appear For Trial, First Degree Sexual Assault & Flight To Avoid Prosecution

Originating Agency: East Greenwich Police Department

History: Fischer fled the State during a trial in Newport, Rhode Island, where he was being tried on sexual assault charges.

Status: At large

Julio Merida

D.O.B: 5/12/1960

Race/Ethnicity: Hispanic

Sex: Male

Height: 5'7"

Weight: 150 pounds

Hair: Brown

Eyes: Brown

RI - SID: 8703400

Last Known Address: 163 Elmwood Avenue, Providence, RI

Alias Name/D.O.B: Salomon Andrade Martinez

Remarks:

Charges: Murder (two counts)

Originating Agency: Providence Police Department

History: Merida is wanted for the fatal shooting of two individuals in the City of Providence, Rhode Island on October 18, 1987.

Status: At large

Rigoberto Vasquez

D.O.B: 05/04/1962

Race/Ethnicity:

Sex: Male

Height: 6'0"

Weight: 168

Hair: Grey

Eyes: Brown

Last Known Address: Providence RI

Alias Name/D.O.B:

Remarks:

Charges: DUI Death Resulting

Originating Agency: Central Falls Police Department

History: On 01/17/2016 at approximately 3:05 am, officers responded to the area of 535 Roosevelt Avenue for a serious car and pedestrian accident where the suspect vehicle had fled the scene. A victim had been located at the scene with very serious, life threatening injuries.

Status: At large
